channel.title: My FLoC Experience
channel.description: My name is Chris, and this year I’m attending the Federated Logic Conference, located in Oxford. This is a mini podcast series about my experiences while I’m here.
channel.itunes:author: Chris Patuzzo

item.title: Day 1
item.author: Chris Patuzzo
item.description: First, let me tell you a bit about who I am and what this conference is.
